To use: Install UnicodeInjector.jsx in one of the InDesign Scripts
folders.

Double-click UnicodeInjector.jsx to see a configuration dialog.

Make sure to read the info at the start of the UnicodeInjector.jsx file

View the video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lO97JmZ9jEk

Please open the UnicodeInjector.jsx file with any text editor like
Notepad, TextEdit, TextWrangler, BBEdit...

The documentation can be found in human-readable form at the start
of the script file.
